column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is ok
column2: and maybe I just had my expectations set too high due to all the hype
column3: but our party left a little disappointed. Some of the things we ordered were better than others
column4: we really enjoyed the tempura mashed potatoes
column5: but the corn was pretty salty. Two people at our table order the skirt stake medium rare
column6: and both had it brought to them well done. I had the Goat Almighty burger
column7: and aside from it being an impressively large burger
column8: it wasn't the best burger I've ever had. Salty
